column4: I keep booting into low graphics mode, thought it was because of incompatible drivers, you know what hte problem is if i'm already using those drivers?
abiword is awesome
if you only use writer in OOo then remove it (saves you 500Mb, then install Abiword (uses about 3Mb~)
it will do its best, xlsx is a proprietary format
thanks, i can always convert first i suppose, not a big deal
the computer community at large (except MS) is pushing for an open format that all suites can use
how big is the partition?
15 GB
so you have a 15Gb partition with 500Mb used?
15 GB partition, df -h is saying it's 98% used, but in nautilus it's only showing me 500 MB
sounds like the journal to me, is it using a jounalised file system
du -hs /* | sort -nr | head -n 20       should help
yes, du -h    shows it human readable
the command I gave should give clues :)
niiiiice
www.bing.com www.ask.com www.google.com
some I know, some i websearch for
is it a linux game or a wine game?
linux
then run:   sudo find / | grep aqua       will find the file more than likely
if you run:  ln -s /opt/aquaria/aquaria /usr/bin/aquaria        then create a launcher to run: aquaria
reisio: so is mine apparently, thanks for those commands, learned something new which is what i was hoping for
every day is a school day :)
